ygData.subject: Cazic Thule
ygData.msgSnippet: YUCK. I spent the day in Cazic Thule.  I loved it and hated it.  Experience galore, but I died five times and gave most of it back.  Loot is okay, but the
ygData.messageBody:
YUCK.

I spent the day in Cazic Thule. I loved it and hated it. Experience
galore, but I died five times and gave most of it back. Loot is okay,
but the market for fine steel is drowned and merchants only give me
about 6pp and 6gp for Two Handed Swords.

The data rate tends to hover between 1200 and 3000 in the Courtyard, and
the maze even got camped out later in the day so that the data rate was
still greater than 1000 in there. That just made tough situations
worse.

Are there any good open areas for a 23 bard to go to? I am sort of
burnt out on indoor areas and confined spaces. I have never been to
Mistmore. Is that an outdoor zone? What levels is it good for?

Narcissus of Povar
